channel.title: Height Level
channel.description: hey again, guys im really stuck here .. i added a minigame thats make your height level 3 and when players are finished the teleport to home and cant see anyone so can someone tell me a command that will return your height level to 0 something like ::height0 or sometihng plz help thanks everyone

item.title: Height Level
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“height0”)
{
heightLevel = 0;
}

Careful, people can abuse it.

EDIT: what you do is…
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)
{
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
heightLevel = 0;
}

Read full topic
